title: Motorcycle icon Royal Enfield faces fresh challenge from Harley, Triumph in Indiaâ€™s biker paradise
description: Like Triumph, US giant Harley-Davidson Inc. is also renewing efforts in India, where Royal Enfield is revered to a similar extent as Harley is in the US. Their decision to manufacture more affordable, smaller-engine motorcycles locally is paying off, giving them a better chance of pulling closer to Royal Enfield.
